body: scriptPath: $1  # Required  # Relative path from repo root of the shell script file to run.
#args:  # Optional  # Arguments passed to the shell script
#disableAutoCwd:  # Optional  # The default behavior is to set the working directory to the script location. This enables you to optionally specify a different working directory.
#cwd:  # Optional  # Current working directory where the script is run.  Empty is the root of the repo (build) or artifacts (release), which is $(System.DefaultWorkingDirectory).
#failOnStandardError:  # Optional  # If this is true, this task will fail if any errors are written to the StandardError stream.
Shell script.description: Run a shell script using Bash
